data.text:
@atrupar It was 2 years ago last week that we took a tour of the Canadian Parliament buildings. No masks in sight at that point in time, but Purell dispensers were popping up all over the place.

Little did we know that just a couple weeks later, we wouldn't even be able to enter Canada.
@LincolnWatchman @atrupar Yep. Politicians seized power and screwed us. They now know our limits don't exist. Sad.
@MikeHolloway @atrupar Look at Britain too. Dropped their mandates and the new varient is spreading fast.
@LincolnWatchman @atrupar Oh wow! Almost the same here! I ended up in ICU with pneumonia on my Right Lung! Scary time for me the entire month of March 2020 and Covid raking with vengeance New York!!

@atrupar The 2nd Omicron variant says hello.
https://t.co/m1lPT1B8qA
@atrupar My daughter turned 21 and the next day everything was shut down. I had 3 conferences and her Vegas birthday vacation were canceled. Thankfully we were all safe. 😷🦠
@atrupar Why do we need to worry about Covid now they’ve created unrest in Ukraine?
